Body:
n = NewOrderCommand(121234, 1234235.123, 2342, 'user_x', MARKET, BID_SIDE,
    FAR, Price('34.52'), 100)
oec = OrderEventChain(n, LOGGER, MonotonicIntID())
ack = AcknowledgementReport(121235, 1234235.123, 2342, 'user_x', MARKET, n,
    Price('34.52'), 100, 100)
oec.apply_acknowledgement_report(ack)
aggressor = NewOrderCommand(1111, 1234237.123, 22222, 'user_y', MARKET,
    ASK_SIDE, FAR, Price('34.52'), 100)
pf = PartialFillReport(1212344, 1234237.123, 2342, 'user_x', MARKET,
    aggressor, 100, Price('34.52'), BID_SIDE, 99999, 0)
oec.apply_partial_fill_report(pf)
assert oec.open_exposure_requests() == []
assert oec.is_open() is False
assert oec.visible_qty() == 0
assert oec.current_exposure() == Exposure(None, 0, 1212344)
